title: malariNai
sahitya:
malariNai tuNaiyE mahAdEva nin charaNa


anupallavi

  alagil sakala ulaga vaghaiyum amararum anbarkuzhAmum
alarayanu murAriyum purandaranum paNindiDum pada


caraNam    tirumAlayan ariyAda tiruvaDimuDi kANavanru tiruvArUranbar
 poruttuvam kondu tiruvIdi tanil naDandOr terivaiyiDam paNbanenana
 shenravanE nIlOtpala mAdhu maruvam tyAgEshanE singAdana nAyakA
 bhujangAbharaNA vIdi viDangA rAmadAsan uLam kAdal konDa tiruvaDi
